FreeRTOSConfig.h

00054 #ifndef FREERTOS_CONFIG_H
00055 #define FREERTOS_CONFIG_H
00056 
00057 /*-----------------------------------------------------------
00058  * Application specific definitions.
00059  *
00060  * These definitions should be adjusted for your particular hardware and
00061  * application requirements.
00062  *
00063  * THESE PARAMETERS ARE DESCRIBED WITHIN THE 'CONFIGURATION' SECTION OF THE
00064  * FreeRTOS API DOCUMENTATION AVAILABLE ON THE FreeRTOS.org WEB SITE.
00065  *
00066  * See http://www.freertos.org/a00110.html.
00067  *----------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 
00069 #define configUSE_PREEMPTION            1
00070 #define configUSE_IDLE_HOOK                     0
00071 #define configUSE_TICK_HOOK                     0
00072 #define configCPU_CLOCK_HZ                      ( ( unsigned long ) 64000000 )
00073 #define configTICK_RATE_HZ                      ( ( portTickType ) 1000 )
00074 #define configMAX_PRIORITIES            ( ( unsigned portBASE_TYPE ) 5 )
00075 #define configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE        ( ( unsigned short ) 128 )
00076 #define configTOTAL_HEAP_SIZE           ( ( size_t ) ( 30 * 1024 ) )
00077 #define configMAX_TASK_NAME_LEN         ( 16 )
00078 #define configUSE_TRACE_FACILITY        1
00079 #define configUSE_16_BIT_TICKS          0
00080 #define configIDLE_SHOULD_YIELD         1
00081 
00082 /* Co-routine definitions. */
00083 #define configUSE_CO_ROUTINES           0
00084 #define configMAX_CO_ROUTINE_PRIORITIES ( 2 )
00085 
00086 #define configUSE_MUTEXES                               0
00087 #define configUSE_COUNTING_SEMAPHORES   0
00088 #define configUSE_ALTERNATIVE_API               0
00089 #define configCHECK_FOR_STACK_OVERFLOW  0
00090 #define configUSE_RECURSIVE_MUTEXES             0
00091 #define configQUEUE_REGISTRY_SIZE               0
00092 #define configGENERATE_RUN_TIME_STATS   0
00093 
00094 /* Set the following definitions to 1 to include the API function, or zero
00095 to exclude the API function. */
00096 
00097 #define INCLUDE_vTaskPrioritySet                1
00098 #define INCLUDE_uxTaskPriorityGet               1
00099 #define INCLUDE_vTaskDelete                             1
00100 #define INCLUDE_vTaskCleanUpResources   0
00101 #define INCLUDE_vTaskSuspend                    1
00102 #define INCLUDE_vTaskDelayUntil                 1
00103 #define INCLUDE_vTaskDelay                              1
00104 
00105 /* This is the raw value as per the Cortex-M3 NVIC.  Values can be 255
00106 (lowest) to 0 (1?) (highest). */
00107 #define configKERNEL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY                 255
00108 #define configMAX_SYSCALL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY    191 /* equivalent to 0xb0, or priority 11. */
00109 
00110 
00111 /* This is the value being used as per the ST library which permits 16
00112 priority values, 0 to 15.  This must correspond to the
00113 configKERNEL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY setting.  Here 15 corresponds to the lowest
00114 NVIC value of 255. */
00115 #define configLIBRARY_KERNEL_INTERRUPT_PRIORITY 15
00116 
00117 
00118 
00119 #endif /* FREERTOS_CONFIG_H */
00120
